events.message: We received your application for the Software Engineer position and have started reviewing your resume and cover letter carefully.
After screening your application, we have categorised it under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiting specialist focusing on engineering roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening call to assess your software development skills and discuss your relevant experience in detail.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed answers during the initial screening. It provided us a clear understanding of your capabilities.
We have scheduled your technical interview with the development team for May 10th at 2 PM UTC, focusing on coding and system design.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of software engineering principles.
We have arranged your HR interview to discuss cultural fit, work preferences, and benefits on May 14th at 11 AM UTC.
The HR interview was completed smoothly, with a positive discussion about your career goals and alignment with our company values.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits tailored to your experience.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer package; we are glad you found it satisfactory and are excited about the prospect of you joining the team.
You have formally accepted the offer to join us as a Software Engineer, and we look forward to welcoming you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to company systems, introductions to team members, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process is now closed with your successful integration into the engineering team as a full-time Software Engineer.
